Room.Name: Overland Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are casually walking along Overland Drive, minding your own business.
Room.LongDescription: Overland Drive passes by three of the wealthiest estates in Oceancrest. You are now approximately at the center of all three. On the north is the Khelleva Stables, part of the Khelleva Estate. On the southeast is the Iilandi Family Estate, owners of the Richland Grape Orchard and the Klondike Wheat Fields. On the southwest is the Odgen Family Villa.
